title: James Heappey – 2021 Comments on Daesh Weapons Seized in Mali
author: admin
summary: The comments made by James Heappey, the Minister for the Armed Forces, on 3 November 2021.
content:
These operations are yet another example of how UK peacekeepers are making a real difference to the UN mission to protect civilians in Mali.
